html:
Worms digging holes
Crawling on the ground
Hyenas laughing
At in the front of you
Marbles of beauty
That cannot be described
Merciless death
Only because one can kill
Moving people to places
Places of concentration
Because of such reasons
Or completely different
The system is working
Just look at it go
Designed by soulless
Maybe cry a little
title: Concentration
